name: Bachelor Brawl
description:
A hand-drawn amalgamation of Super Smash Brothers and The Bachelor, "Bachelor Brawl" is a local multiplayer fighting game where you battle for the affection of a desirable bachelor. Find success by wooing him over, or just knock him out cold! The choice is yours. Players play as both the contestants and the Bachelor, who is trying to ward off increasingly aggressive advances.

This game was created for Unreal Engine's 2019 Winter gamejam.
